name: Sales Leader
description: Manager or director responsible for team performance and forecasting

role.title: Sales Manager / Director of Sales / VP Sales
role.decision_authority: Team tool purchases, budget allocation, process changes

pains: No visibility into deals without asking reps
Forecast is unreliable and embarrassing in board meetings
Ramp time for new hires is too long
Can't scale coaching across the team
success_criteria: Spend time on strategy, not admin
evaluation_heuristics: Will my reps actually adopt this?
Does this help me coach or just surveil?
Can I show ROI to leadership?
Does it integrate with our existing stack?
fears: Creating surveillance culture that kills morale
Investing in something that doesn't show ROI
